column4: Is there any way to connect to the internet with a wireless USB modem in linux, which is initially compatible only with windows?
some usb-wireless  things have drivers for linux.. some dont.
Is there a way to instruct the device to dial the same number I would dial on windows?
no idea. I would check google and the ubuntu forums for your exact device..  Ive not used a dialup modem in ubuntu in years.
